headline: MUST SEE: Maria Bartiromo & Jim Jordan DESTROY Dem/Media collusion on Hunter Biden, SLAP Chris Wallace for good measure
author: Fred T
sentences: For the second Sunday in a row, Maria Bartiromo has slapped ex-colleague Chris Wallace, who was recently demoted from the majors to CNN’s streaming service, for his embarrassing behavior with President Trump over the Hunter Biden story.
Bartiromo had Rep. Jim Jordan on air this morning, and the two of them delivered maybe the best segment on Hunter Biden and the laptop and Joe Biden complicity that I’ve seen on TV news.
She starts showing the debate clip and then talks to Ron Johnson and they also absolutely trash the media’s collusion.
The corruption of the media here is as bad as the original corruption by the Biden’s it’s the same.
(This post has been updated to include a second video.)
This is how you should always start your day.
I love the casual smacking of Chris Wallace.
Here’s a selection from last week’s show.
This cannot be said or reported enough.
